mapper.select: SELECT distinct b.wh_name FROM logis_wh b, logis a WHERE a.logis_code = b.logis_code and a.logis_code = #{logis_code} order by b.wh_name
SELECT distinct sup_goods_laca FROM sup_goods order by sup_goods_laca
SELECT distinct sup_goods_smca FROM sup_goods order by sup_goods_smca

SELECT distinct k.taking_code ,k.wh_code ,j.wh_name ,k.taking_date FROM logis_stock_taking k ,logis_wh j ,hq_goods l WHERE j.logis_code = k.logis_code AND j.wh_code = k.wh_code AND l.hq_goods_code = k.hq_goods_code AND l.hq_goods_code = j.hq_goods_code
and k.logis_code = #{keywordMap.logis_code} ORDER by k.taking_date desc

SELECT DISTINCT i.computer_stock, i.actual_stock, i.adjust_quantity,
i.deff_quantity, i.hq_goods_code, j.hq_goods_name, j.hq_goods_code, h.logis_goods_stock FROM logis_stock_taking i, logis_wh h, hq_goods j WHERE h.hq_goods_code = i.hq_goods_code AND j.hq_goods_code = h.hq_goods_code AND h.logis_code = #{logis_code} AND h.wh_code = #{wh_code} AND i.taking_code = #{taking_code}
SELECT count(*) FROM logis_stock_taking i, logis_wh h, hq_goods j WHERE h.hq_goods_code = i.hq_goods_code AND j.hq_goods_code = h.hq_goods_code AND i.taking_code = #{taking_code}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO LOGIS_STOCK_TAKING (TAKING_CODE, LOGIS_CODE, WH_CODE, TAKING_DATE, COMPUTER_STOCK, ACTUAL_STOCK, DEFF_QUANTITY, ADJUST_QUANTITY, TAKING_ST) VALUES (#{taking_code},#{logis_code},#{wh_code},#{comquan},#{realquan},#{realquan}-#{comquan},#{realquan}-#{comquan},SYSDATE,2)

INSERT INTO LOGIS_STOCK_TAKING (TAKING_CODE, LOGIS_CODE, WH_CODE, HQ_GOODS_CODE,COMPUTER_STOCK,ACTUAL_STOCK,DEFF_QUANTITY,ADJUST_QUANTITY,TAKING_ST, TAKING_DATE) VALUES (#{takingCode},#{logis_code}, #{wh_code}, #{goodsCode},#{comquan},#{realquan},#{realquan}-#{comquan},#{realquan}-#{comquan}, 2, SYSDATE)

UPDATE LOGIS_WH A SET (HQ_GOODS_CODE, LOGIS_GOODS_STOCK)= ( SELECT HQ_GOODS_CODE, ACTUAL_STOCK FROM LOGIS_STOCK_TAKING B WHERE TAKING_CODE = #{takingCode} AND A.HQ_GOODS_CODE = B.HQ_GOODS_CODE ) WHERE LOGIS_CODE = #{logis_code} AND WH_CODE = #{wh_code} AND HQ_GOODS_CODE IN ( SELECT HQ_GOODS_CODE FROM LOGIS_STOCK_TAKING L WHERE TAKING_CODE = #{takingCode} )
